title: Redmi Turbo 5 and Turbo 5 Pro chipsets revealed in new leak
description: Over the past few months, multiple rumors surrounding the Redmi Turbo 5 series have surfaced online. Now, a fresh leak has revealed the chipsets expected to power the Turbo 5 and Turbo 5 Pro. According to a tipster on Weibo, the Redmi Turbo 5 will be equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 8500 SoC, whereas the Turbo 5 Pro will use the Dimensity 9500e chipset. Redmi Turbo 4 It‚Äôs worth noting that both Dimensity chipsets have yet to be announced. title: Samsung's upcoming Brain Health feature detects early signs of dementia
description: At CES next month, where it's holding a product launch in its own standalone exhibition space, Samsung is now rumored to be demonstrating a new Brain Health feature that detects early signs of dementia. This will work by analyzing various metrics, and will join Samsung's many other preventative healthcare features, which include blood pressure monitoring, ECG, and irregular heart rhythm notifications. The new Brain Health feature will use data collected by Samsung smartphones and smartwatches, including gait patterns, changes in a user's voice, and sleep status. Based on analysis of...

title: Here's the iQOO Z11 Turbo in all four colors
description: The iQOO Z11 Turbo's teaser campaign continues in China, where the brand has now showcased its rear design in all four colors in which it will be sold. As you can see, it will be offered in pink, black, white, and blue. iQOO Z11 Turbo colors The phone has a metal frame, a glass back, a 6.59-inch flat LTPS OLED screen with "1.5K" resolution and 144Hz refresh rate, a 200MP main camera, an 8MP ultrawide, a 32MP selfie snapper, an ultrasonic in-display fingerprint scanner, and a 7,600 mAh battery with support for 120W wired charging. It's powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC,...

title: Redmi Pad 2 Pro price in India leaks along with release date
description: The Redmi Pad 2 Pro was initially launched in September, and now it's almost ready to make its official debut in India. According to a tipster over on X, the tablet will have its first sale in India on January 12. It will allegedly be priced at INR 25,000 with 6GB of RAM and 128GB of storage. The 8/128GB version will apparently go for INR 28,000, while the top of the line model with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage will cost INR 30,000. The Redmi Pad 2 Pro has a 12.1-inch 2560x1600 LCD touchscreen with 120Hz refresh rate and 600-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC, an...

title: Samsung launches the Galaxy A17 and Galaxy Tab A11+ in the US, here are the prices
description: Samsung is finally bringing the Galaxy A17 5G to the US. This phone was launched elsewhere in August. Joining it is the Galaxy Tab A11+, which was initially released in early November in other markets. [#InlinePriceWidget,14041,1#] The Galaxy A17 5G will become available on January 7 for $199.99 at AT&T, T-Mobile, Metro by T-Mobile, Verizon, and Samsung Experience Stores. It will be offered in black, blue, and gray. Samsung is selling the model with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of expandable storage in the US. The phone has a 6.7-inch 1080x2340 Super AMOLED touchscreen with 90Hz refresh...

title: Infinix Note Edge promo image leaks along with its specs
description: Infinix is allegedly working on a new smartphone, which will be called Note Edge and is set to make its official debut in January. According to a tipster over on X, the Infinix Note Edge has a 3D curved AMOLED screen with "1.5K" resolution and a 6,500 mAh battery. It's powered by MediaTek's Dimensity 7100 SoC, and will come with a promise of receiving three major Android OS updates and five years of security patches. The Dimensity 7100 is the successor to the Dimensity 7050, and it comes with an octa-core CPU with four Cortex-A78 big cores clocked at up to 2.4GHz and four Cortex-A55...

title: WhatsApp rolls out New Year 2026 stickers, video call effects, and more
description: To ring in the New Year 2026, WhatsApp has rolled out new stickers, video call effects, animated reactions, and more festive features. WhatsApp has added a new 2026 sticker pack that includes party themed stickers to send to your friends and family. There are new animated effects that are available during video calls, including fireworks, stars, and confetti, which show up as an overlay. Users will also see special reactions when they react to a message with the confetti emoji. And finally, animated stickers are also available in Status updates. There‚Äôs also a special 2026 layout...

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra dummy units star in live images, hands-on video
description: If you wanted to take a closer look at the design of the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra, today some pictures showing dummy units have been outed, along with a quick hands-on video (of the dummies). In the first photo below you can see the S26 Ultra standing next to the S26 (on the right), sharing the exact same design with the oval-shaped camera island onto which three cameras are placed. title: Huawei Mate X7 review
Galaxy S26 series will deliver improved on-device AI
description: Samsung announced the Exynos 2600 last week as the world‚Äôs first 2nm chipset. It is expected to make its debut on the Galaxy S26 series in Q1, 2026, and we now have some additional details regarding the 2600‚Äôs AI capabilities. title: OnePlus 16 will reportedly bring a major camera update
description: The OnePlus 15 is only in the early stages of its life cycle, but the world of tech moves at blazing speeds, and we are now getting some early spec details on its successor. According to tipster Digital Chat Station, OnePlus 16 will offer a 200MP camera sensor. This comes shortly after the tipster shared similar info regarding the Oppo Find N6, which is also expected to carry a 200MP telephoto cam. OnePlus 15 DCS is confident that the Oppo Find N6 and OnePlus 16 will share the same camera hardware for their main and telephoto sensors. This was also the case on the Find N5 and...

title: iQOO 15 Ultra to have the biggest active cooling fan ever
description: The iQOO 15 was introduced in China in October and then started appearing in other countries a month later. vivo's sub-brand is now working on the iQOO 15 Ultra, according to a new rumor from Digital Chat Station on Weibo. This device was rumored in October as well, and today we get more purported details about it. The iQOO 15 Ultra will become official before February 17. It will be focused on gaming, as rumored before. It will have an active cooling fan as well as shoulder buttons. The fan will be the largest ever put inside a smartphone and will have the best cooling...

title: Poco M8 and Poco M8 Pro prices and specs outed by premature retailer listings
description: The Poco M8 is getting official on January 8, and ahead of that the brand has already started its teaser campaign, even showing the device's design. The M8 Pro might join the M8 on that date. If you're wondering what to expect in terms of pricing, however, Poco itself is understandably staying mum on that front, but a Russian retailer has already prematurely listed the upcoming devices. title: TCL unveils the Note A1 NxtPaper digital notepad
description: Today TCL has officially unveiled the Note A1 NxtPaper, a digital note taking device that's aiming to compete against the ReMarkable Paper Pro and even the Kindle Scribe. TCL's device has an 8,000 mAh battery with "long standby" and support for 33W wired charging, 8GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, and an 11.5-inch 2200x1440 NxtPaper Pure display with 120Hz refresh rate, 300-nit peak brightness, certified eye comfort, and paper-like reflection-free clarity. It has adaptive brightness too for reduced eye strain in any ambient lighting conditions. It's powered by MediaTek's Helio G100 SoC and has...

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra to come with new lens to combat flare
description: We've heard a few rumors about the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's camera system, and the latest, coming out of China, claims Samsung will address some camera issues with its upcoming flagship. We are referring to a post by popular tipster Ice Universe on Weibo. It is in Chinese, and machine translation to English suggests the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's camera will have reduced lens flare. Additionally, the Galaxy S26 Ultra will feature "enhanced lens and coating technology," and skin tones will no longer turn yellow in images. Ice Universe's Weibo post machine translated from Chinese...

title: Realme Neo8 Infinite edition retail box leaks, display specs revealed
description: A recent leak suggested that the Realme Neo8 will debut in China in January. Now, another leak hints that Realme may also introduce a Neo8 Infinite edition alongside it. The Realme Neo8 Infinite edition‚Äôs retail box image has surfaced online. According to the tipster who shared the image, the box notes that the phone will feature a Samsung screen. Meanwhile, leakster Digital Chat Station has revealed that the Neo8 series will come with a Samsung-made display that will offer a refresh rate of 165Hz. The screen is said to use the latest luminescent material and offer specs similar to...

title: Oppo Find N6 tipped to pack a 200MP rear camera
description: Oppo‚Äôs next foldable flagship phone, the Find N6, is rumored to launch in February 2026. While there‚Äôs no official announcement regarding the launch, a new leak has revealed new details about the foldable. According to well known leakster Digital Chat Station, the Find N6 will feature a triple rear camera setup with two 50MP sensors and a 200MP sensor. Oppo Find N5 featured a 50MP periscope telephoto camera. The tipster believes that Oppo may use the 200MP sensor for the periscope telephoto camera. Previously, the phone was tipped to offer a 50MP periscope telephoto. The Oppo...

title: Poco M8's launch date and design revealed
description: Poco has announced it will unveil the Poco M8 in India on January 8 at 12 PM local time. The company said that the Poco M8 is "built for a new generation of users who seek performance with standout aesthetic," and it will bring a fresh design-led approach to the mid-range smartphone segment in India. Poco hasn't detailed the M8's specs sheet, but the brand said it will be 7.35mm thin and weigh 178 g, making it the "slimmest and lightest" smartphone in the segment. Slim by design. title: More vivo X300 Ultra specs surface in new leak
description: vivo X300 Ultra is expected to launch globally soon, as it recently received certification in Europe. Ahead of any official announcement, multiple leaks have surfaced online, revealing the phone‚Äôs key specs. The latest leak has revealed the display details of the vivo X300 Ultra. According to tipster Digital Chat Station, the upcoming camera flagship will sport a flat 6.82-inch BOE LTPO display with 2K resolution. title: iQOO Z11 Turbo runs Geekbench revealing its chipset and memory amount
description: The iQOO Z11 Turbo is coming soon to China, and a few days ago the brand revealed its rear design. Now, the phone has been spotted in the Geekbench database with the model number V2536A. It's powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, paired with 16GB of RAM. It runs Android 16. As you can see from the screenshot below, the prototype which ran Geekbench managed a single-core score of 2,753 and a multi-core score of 8,990, but as always we'd caution you against taking such scores too seriously as the device hasn't been launched yet. The Z11 Turbo's leaked specs include a 6.59-inch flat...
